refsection.title: PARAMETERS
refsection.para:
This function have same parameters as ann_FF_Std_online_nb except for:
ex string representing a valid Scilab program sequence, executed after each epoch trough execstr.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns the updated weight hypermatrix of a feedforward ANN, after training with a given set of patterns, T times. The algorithm used is standard batch backpropagation. This function is to be used on networks without biases.
